question: 1 (a)
sols_html:
The matrix or operator norm is defined as

\[\begin{aligned} \left \| A \right \| = \max_{x:\, \left \| x \right \|\neq 0}\frac{\left \| Ax \right \|}{\left \| x \right \|}\end{aligned}\]
sols_raw:
The ''matrix'' or ''operator norm'' is defined as

:<math>\left \| A \right \| = \max_{x:\, \left \| x \right \|\neq 0}\frac{\left \| Ax \right \|}{\left \| x \right \|}</math>
statement_html: Write down the definition of the matrix norm \(\|A\|\) of a matrix A.
statement_latex:
Write down the definition of the matrix norm $\|A\|$ of a matrix
\emph{A}.
statement_raw: Write down the definition of the matrix norm <math>\|A\|</math> of a matrix ''A''.
